resources.string: Game rules: on a display, there will be three figures, two below and one above, two of them will contain numbers. It is necessary that the sum of the numbers from the bottom two shapes will be equal to the number from the top shape, for this you need to choose the missing number.\n\nFor example: there are number 7 in the top circle, question mark in one of the bottom shapes and number 4 in another. It means that there must be number 3 instead of the question mark, because 3+4 = 7
The percent of the right answers: %s
The right answers are %s from %s required
The required percent of the right answers: %s
The required number of the right answers: %s
